availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p:
Kentucky native. Son of George Wolford and Ann Wolford. Married to Cynthia Agness Palmon Wolford in Boone County, Kentucky on May 6, 1857. Father of John James Wolford and Mary Elizabeth Wolford.
Manager of farm in Boone County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District 2, p. 219A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Union, p. 392.
